price: Ka ce: "Ashe, kun gani! Idan (Alƙur'ãni) ya kasance daga Allah ne, sa'an nan kun kãfirta a game da Shi, wãne ne mafi ɓata daga wanda yake yanã a cikin sãɓani manisanci (daga gaskiya)?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin baʿīdin
